definition: Dutchman's pipe cactus, aka Queen of the Night cactus (Epiphyllum oxypetalum)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
lit. the night-blooming cactus shows once/flash in the pan (idiom)/short-lived

sentences.english: These nonsense letter, they are only the night-blooming cereus blossom from the fingertip.
sentences.chinese: 這些胡言亂語的文字，它們只是指尖開出的曇花。

sentences.english: After the dazzling fireworks flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum, after the passion of vanity.
sentences.chinese: 煙火璀璨過後的曇花一現，激情過後的空虛失落。

sentences.english: My friend came by and gave me this beautiful epiphyllum.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友到來，送我這個美麗的曇花。

sentences.english: The low inflation rate will be no flash in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 低通貨膨脹率不會只是曇花一現。

sentences.english: That is just a night-blooming flower?
And about to climb, Tan Hua explained.
The trendy rock group was only a flash - in - the - pan.
sentences.chinese: 新潮搖滾樂隊只是曇花一現。

sentences.english: But as I said this morning, this can’t be a fleeting moment.
sentences.chinese: 但正如我今天上午所說，這不應當是曇花一現的瞬間。

sentences.english: Apparition of these faces in the crowd. Petals on a wet, black, bough.
sentences.chinese: 人海中嬌顏幽幽浮現，溼漉漉黑枝曇花片片。

sentences.english: These words of nonsense, are only the night-blooming cereus.
sentences.chinese: 這些胡言亂語的文字，它們只是指尖開出的曇花。

sentences.english: It has become the symbol for all that is transient and evanescent in life.
sentences.chinese: 它已成爲所有的符號是短暫的曇花一現的生活。

sentences.english: We're hoping that this is a long-term opportunity, and not just a flash in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望這是一個長遠的機會，而不會只是曇花一現。

sentences.english: The upturn following a decline is often shortlived and prices might resume their decline.
sentences.chinese: 復甦後下降往往是曇花一現，價格可能恢復下降。

sentences.english: But emerging markets are prone to boom-and-bust cycles.
sentences.chinese: 但新興市場很容易陷入曇花一現的輪迴。

sentences.english: They are merely passers-by on the stage of history.
sentences.chinese: 他們不過是歷史舞臺上曇花一現的人物。

sentences.english: Cool, Lake painting wound, the fact bleak, flower briefly as the broad-leaved epiphyllum.
sentences.chinese: 微涼了，湖畔畫傷，望斷事實淒涼，曇花一現。

definition: bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

definition: pattra palm tree (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
